quote: “The iPhone killed romance and turned us all into lazy, nasty stalkers...”
author: Caroline Kepnes, You Love Me

quote: “The iPhone actually takes pretty damn good photos—even Annie Leibovitz thinks so.”
author: A.D. Aliwat, In Limbo

quote: “A selfie has more face and fewer feelings.”
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words

quote: “When he’s staring into a screen, he’s staring into the abyss. That void of his own making. Of course the abyss would stare back at you.”
author: A.D. Aliwat, In Limbo

quote: “With the selfies, a photographer has finally found his place in a photograph.”
author: Amit Kalantri, Wealth of Words
